title: Simply Gluten Free Summer Entertaining
description: Summer is all about fun, friends, family and food! Barbecues, picnics and holiday celebrations are plentiful and luckily so are Carol Kicinski's gluten free recipes.Carol gives you 17 delicious summer inspired recipes for main dishes, side dishes and desserts. You can build a complete party menu that all your guests will love regardless of whether or not they are gluten free.So whether you are entertaining guests for Memorial Day, Father's Day or just to celebrate summer, these recipes are sure to be a hit.Carol has also added a BONUS page of her best gluten free grilling tips, so even a beginning grill cook can get closer to the title of Grill Master!
author: Carol Kicinski
